subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] QS-SAMPA: a proposed format for plain-text Quickscript
msgSnippet: ... Yes, we are.  When typing in TeX, you represent left curly quotes with ` and right curly quotes (and apostrophes) with .  Overloading ` makes TeX users
messageBody:
Ted Larson Freeman scripsit:
> OK, we're not talking about TeX any more, right?

Yes, we are. When typing in TeX, you represent left curly quotes with
` and right curly quotes (and apostrophes) with '. Overloading ` makes
TeX users' lives difficult.

--
John Cowan cowan@... http://ccil.org/~cowan
It's the old, old story. Droid meets droid. Droid becomes chameleon.
Droid loses chameleon, chameleon becomes blob, droid gets blob back
again. It's a classic tale. --Kryten, Red Dwarf

> OK, we're not talking about TeX any more, right?

Yes, we are.  When typing in TeX, you represent left curly quotes with
